Direct Item Hints.Progressive Slam: LADIES AND GENTLEMEN! IT APPEARS THAT ONE FIGHTER HAS COME UNEQUIPPED TO PROPERLY HANDLE THIS REPTILLIAN BEAST. PERHAPS THEY SHOULD HAVE LOOKED IN GLOOMY GALLEON OR ANGRY AZTEC FOR THE ELUSIVE SLAM.
